summary: Backend API testing completed successfully (7/7 tests passed). Frontend has critical build error preventing page load - babel metadata plugin causing infinite loop in compilation process.

critical_build_errors.issue: Maximum call stack size exceeded in babel-metadata-plugin.js
critical_build_errors.details: Infinite loop between getArrayIterationContext and analyzeMemberExpression functions
critical_build_errors.impact: Frontend cannot compile or load - complete application failure

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend build error in babel-metadata-plugin.js causing infinite loop. The plugin at /app/frontend/plugins/visual-edits/babel-metadata-plugin.js has recursive calls between getArrayIterationContext (line 973-974) and analyzeMemberExpression (line 630) causing maximum call stack exceeded error. Frontend cannot load until this is resolved.
